QUESTION 37. What dost thou understand by

the word ,· SUFFERED 2

ANSWER.

That all the time He lived on earth, but especially at the end of His life, He bore, in body and soul, the Wrath of God against the sin of the whole human race3 in order that: by His passion, as the only atoning sacrifice, He might redeem our body and soul from everlasting damnation, and obtain for us the grace of God, righteousness and eternal life.
